Question: How to create a directory in Java?
I am trying to create a directory in Java. I have tried the following code:
File dir = new File(path + "\\" + nameFolder);
dir.mkdir();

at java.io.File.mkdirs(File.java:1284)

But it is not working. I am getting the following error:
Exception in thread "main" java.io.IOException: Cannot create directory
at java.io.File.mkdir(Native Method) at java.io.File.mkdirs(File.java:1284) at com.example.test.Test.main(Test.java:12)
